title: Ecomm1
author: Ecomm1
content: What are the pros/cons of using a 20 amp circuit versus a 30 amp circuit for a Bitmain S19 Xp 141T ?Thanks,Ron

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: Quote from: Ecomm1 on April 02, 2023, 10:00:12 PMWhat are the pros/cons of using a 20 amp circuit versus a 30 amp circuit for a Bitmain S19 Xp 141T ?Thanks,Rona s19 xp pulls 3100 watts on normal it will work on a 20 amp or a 30 amp.But if you have 2 x s19 xp units they won't work on a 20 amp circuit. while two s19 xp units may work on a 30amp circuit.So the 30 amp is more costly to install as it needs 10 gauge wire not 12 gauge, but may allow for expanding your mining beyond one s19 xp.

comments.author: kano
comments.body: Alas only if you have 220+VIf you have 110V then you shouldn't run any recent miner, or at least expect fires and death happening.
